page.title: 07BECKY'S INTERVIEW
page.content: This is a record of my interview with Mrs Langford who is over 80 years old. Q.How long have you lived in South Petherton? A.I have been a rate_payer since 1946 taking over family property,I have lived on and off in South Petherton 80 years.I have permanently lived in South Petherton nearly 20 years. Q.Have the roads changed much? A.The surfaces are much better now and we have many pavements. Q.Were horses used to pull things? A.90% of the traffic was horse_drawn. Q.Were there many farms? A.In one street alone there were two farms. Q.What services were there? A.Milk was delivered by a milk float and there was a regular postal service,before postmen. cont.on p8
